entries.description: The filesystem path to the WebSphere product installation directory.
The filesystem path to the user installaton directory.
The filesystem path to the product lib directory.
The filesystem path to the product properties directory.
The filesystem path to the product temp directory.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain installed enterprise applications.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain server log files.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain drivers.
The filesystem path to the Java Virtual Machine installation directory.
The filesystem path to the installation directory for MQSeries.
The filesystem path to the installation directory for WebSphere Embedded Publish and Subscribe.
The filesystem path to the installation directory for WebSphere EJB Deployment tool.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain installed connectors.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain transaction log files.
The filesystem path to the MQSeries lib directory.
The filesystem path to the directory which will contain etc config files.
The directory where contains the dirver from Custom JDBC2.0-compliant Provider.
The directory that contains the DB2 JDBC Driver.
The directory that contains the native JDBC Driver for local DB2 connections on iSeries.
The directory that contains the IBM Toolbox JDBC Driver for remote DB2 connections on iSeries.
The directory that contains the DB2 JDBC Driver on zSeries.
The directory that contains the Cloudscape jar files.
The directory that contains the Informix JDBC Driver.
The directory that contains the Sybase JDBC Driver.
The directory that contains the Oracle thin or oci8 JDBC Driver.
The directory that contains the unbranded ConnectJDBC type 4 JDBC Driver for MS SQL Server.
The directory that contains the Microsoft JDBC driver for MSSQLServer 2000.
The directory that contains the DB2 Universal JDBC driver.
The directory that contains the DB2 Universal JDBC driver license file.
Cloudscape Installation Root
